mapper.select: SELECT distinct e.event_id, e.board_id, e.event_name, e.create_date, e.modify_date, e.event_start, e.event_end, (SELECT file_path FROM img_list WHERE POST_NUMBER = e.event_id and rownum=1 AND IMG_PRIORITY = 1) AS poster FROM event e LEFT OUTER JOIN img_list i ON e.event_id = i.POST_NUMBER and e.board_id = i.board_id order by e.event_id desc

SELECT e.*, (SELECT file_path FROM img_list WHERE post_number = e.event_id AND img_priority = 2) AS poster FROM event e inner JOIN img_list i ON e.event_id = i.post_number where e.event_id = #{event_id} and rownum=1 order by e.event_id desc
